alert.note: Alert for Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued October 01 at 6:49PM CDT until October 02 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Carlton and South St. Louis County. In Wisconsin, Douglas County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Fond du Lac Band. * WHEN...Until 1 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dense fog is expected to persist this evening around the head of Lake Superior, including Duluth, Superior, Hermantown, Cloquet, and surrounding areas. The fog is expected to gradually lift overnight as winds switch to southwesterly.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
